verbs.description: [ARG1: audit procedures for a contingent liability contingent liabilities] [V: are] [ARG2: amounts your company owes only in the case of a future event occurring their impact on the financial statements] depends on the likelihood of the contingency being satisfied and the amount of the transaction for example a pending lawsuit could result in a large damage payout in the future
